scripts.debug: export DEBUG=*; npm start; echo 'debug done.'
scripts.kill: pkill -9 $(ps -ax | grep $(pwd) | head -1 | awk '{print $1}'); echo 'stop done.'
scripts.pull: git stash; git pull; echo 'pull done.'
scripts.push: npm run log; read -p 'version: ' -e gitcommit; git commit -a -m "$gitcommit"; git push; echo 'push done.'
scripts.stop: pkill -9 $(ps -ax | grep $(pwd) | head -1 | awk '{print $1}'); echo 'stop done.'
